content: Hi, I'm new here, sorry if it is not the good place to ask this kind of question, since few days, all IGs in build.fhir.org are no more accessible, do you have any idea about the issue and if it is currently being addressed ? many thanks in advance

All of the continuous integration builds got wiped if they hadn't changed recently. The will only come back if/when someone runs a continuous build for the relevant IG. All of the 'official' releases should still be there. We've changed processes to ensure this doesn't happen to the main builds of HL7-published IGs going forward. It will still happen to IGs published by others though unless they've communicated with HL7 that they want their builds protected as well.
@Lloyd McKenzie just curious if it was because of any constraints or just maintenance?
it was a long planned system upgrade to trim old versions, and when we specced it out, we didn't think through all the ramifications
Abdelali Boussadi has marked this topic as resolved.
